verses.verse: Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to <S%H430>me,<s%> God, be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to <S%H5315>me,<s%> for my soul takes <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H6738>you.<s%> Yes, in the shadow of your <S%H3671>wings,<s%> I will take <S%H2620>refuge,<s%> until <S%H1942>disaster<s%> has <S%H5674>passed.<s%>
I <S%H7121>cry<s%> out to <S%H430>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High,<s%> to <S%H410>God<s%> who accomplishes my requests for <S%H1584>me.<s%>

He will <S%H7971>send<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H2778>me,<s%> he rebukes the one who is <S%H7602>pursuing<s%> <S%H5542>me.<s%> Selah. <S%H430>God<s%> will send <S%H7971>out<s%> his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and his <S%H571>truth.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3833>lions.<s%> I <S%H7901>lie<s%> among those who are set on <S%H3857>fire,<s%> even the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are <S%H2595>spears<s%> and <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
Be <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> above the <S%H8064>heavens!<s%> Let your <S%H3519>glory<s%> be above all the <S%H776>earth!<s%>

They have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> for my <S%H6471>steps.<s%> My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is bowed <S%H3721>down.<s%> They <S%H3738>dig<s%> a <S%H7882>pit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5307>me.<s%> They fall into its <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H5542>themselves.<s%> Selah.
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>steadfast,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>steadfast.<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing,<s%> <S%H2167>yes,<s%> I will sing praises.
<S%H5782>Wake<s%> <S%H5782>up,<s%> my <S%H3519>glory!<s%> <S%H5782>Wake<s%> <S%H5035>up,<s%> psaltery and <S%H5035>harp!<s%> I will wake up the <S%H5782>dawn.<s%>
I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H136>you,<s%> Lord, among the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to you among the <S%H3816>nations.<s%>
For your <S%H1419>great<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> reaches to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> to the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>
Be <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> above the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%> Let your <S%H3519>glory<s%> be over all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
